== Main Inclusion Report for QCA-TLS ==

# ''Availability:'' The package is available in ubuntu universe and builds on our three major platforms
# ''Rationale:'' The package is required for Jabber use in Kopete
# ''Security:''
** Wrapper for libssl which is already in main.
** No reported vulnerabilities.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** The package contains 1 dynamically loadable library.  There are no user configuration options.
** Upstream is activly developed inside KDE's SVN.  http://websvn.kde.org/trunk/kdesupport/qca/ and will become a required part of KDE for KDE 4.
** No Debian bugs.
# ''Standards compliance:'' The package meets the FHS and Debian Policy.
# ''Dependencies:''
** Depends only on Qt (does not depend on othe QCA infrastructure)
